alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 6:09AM PST until December 16 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 11 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Washington, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. In Oregon, Upper Hood River Valley, Western Columbia River Gorge and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Western Columbia River Gorge
